subject: French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Sam Querrey, the highest-ranked American on the men’s tour, defeated Lukas Lacko of Slovakia in the first round of the French Open to equal his best showing at Roland Garros.
snippet: Sam Querrey, the highest-ranked American on the men’s tour, defeated Lukas Lacko of Slovakia in the first round of the French Open to equal his best showing at Roland Garros.
